product_name: Old Town Predator MX Sit-On-Top Kayak
long_description: The 12 ft. Old Town Predator MX Sit-On-Top Kayak glides quietly through flatwater, putting you closer to the action. Its exceptional stability and high-traction deck offer a great fishing platform.
short_description: The 12 ft. Old Town Predator MX Sit-On-Top Kayak glides quietly through flatwater, putting you closer to the action. Its exceptional stability and high-traction deck offer a great fishing platform.
